author: tlampen
body:
#### PR description:

This PR improves the layout of the new Payload Inspector plots for DropBoxMetaData introduced in #36520, notably:
-curly braces are removed
-userText is not printed nor checked when comparing if fields are identical 
-cosmetic modifications (newlines, white space removed etc.)

Note that destinationDatabase is hidden if
-for PREP it is oracle://cms_orcoff_prep/CMS_CONDITIONS
-for PROD it is oracle://cms_orcon_prod/CMS_CONDITIONS
Otherwise it is not hidden.

Examples of the plots are attached.

#### PR validation:

PR passes the introduced test, which produces the attached plots.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport foreseen.

![DropBoxMetadata_CompareTwoTags](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51359/153416251-010e2411-2958-4807-a1a0-1a9ea4f4253d.png)
![DropBoxMetadata_Display](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/51359/153416252-a2004945-a84a-4384-9a1a-9134d09f5353.png)
title: Improved layout for Payload Inspector plots for DropBoxMetaData
